text: first marinade the thighs with soy sauce
and shouting wine which is made from
fermented rice and tastes similar to dry
sherry chicken thighs do a lot of work
so they need more cooking but cook
properly they're moist under the Tacy's
part of the bird next add rice vinegar
water and season and leave to marinade
for up to two hours
then chop garlic chili and ginger add
olive oil to a hot pan and fry until
softened add Szechuan peppercorns and
orange zest next add the marinated
chicken thighs along with a marinade
then throw in a pinch of sugar and fry
the chicken into lovely and brown and
the sauce is deliciously thick
finish with chopped spring onions add
lager soy sauce and a few drops of
sesame seed oil
the marinated for flavor sweet and spicy
chicken a fuss free wonder
start squeezing that garlic out want the
flavor coming out beautiful pierce that
open squeeze it in that delicious
